DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Emotional Distress-Anxiety EDANX01 Past 7 Days Felt Fearful Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated response of how often in the past 7 days they felt fearful, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Domain Emotional Distress-Anxiety Past Week Feel Fearful Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's mental health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fear, anxious misery, hyperarousal, and somatic symptoms related to arousal._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual feels or felt fearful._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess fear, anxious misery, hyperarousal, and somatic symptoms related to arousal.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how often an individual experiences something from 1: Never, to 5: Always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: PROMIS Item Banks (Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
